Hello, I’m having a problem where our swerve wheels will drive and turn simultaneously. This is my first time programming swerve and I followed a few tutorials and a lot of documentation. I’ll link our GitHub below to anyone who wishes to view our robot code.

github.com

GitHub - TheHive1827/Main-Robot-Code-2025

Contribute to TheHive1827/Main-Robot-Code-2025 development by creating an account on GitHub.

Your module distances need to be from the center of the robot.

Better to stay away from can Id 1. It is typically the pop.
